name: synapsebunker
text: This is the strip that made me decide that I loved achewood.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Even funnier if viewed while listening to said track.

name: internnumber1
text: My God, you're right. Why hadn't I thought of this before?

name: shogun
text: Is it fourteen times better if listened to fourteen times, as indicated by the track listing?  I wager that it is merely six times better in that situation.

name: molesticide
text: that is complicated bookmaking you're onto, there.

name: tekende
text: I can't conceive of any possible way you could make a reading of this strip last that long, though. Would you just sit there and stare at the comic as the song played fourteen times? Hell of boring, yo.

name: i_love_kate
text: Someone isn't a hardcore fan.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: A comment left by kelsotimebomb was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, Zem, dj_insomniac)

name: luckypyjamas
text: no you listen to it once while reading the strip and thirteen more times while on a treadmill

name: lylebot
text: If you listen to it twice it makes it four times better.  Hell of nonlinear.

name: mustakrakesh
text: This.

name: ted0phile
text:
Chubbied for 'hell of nonlinear'.

If I don't use that sometime in my Calculus class my life will have been for naught.

name: anabanananana
text: I am a HUGE fan of your icon and the flying dog portrayed in it.

name: squares
text: I totally listened to this song at the gym the other day. All snickering to myself, all getting funny looks by the musclebound mullet man in bicycle tights.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
once upon a time at a gym i was a bench away from a very built man who was all goin' nuts to Cheeseburger In Paradise. he started just mouthing the words, then bobbing his head and then just full upper torso contortions. it was hilarious and i'm laughing about it even more as i write this. i wish i had a picture to show you all how silly awesome this was.

yeeeeah.

name: gothfae
text: I tried working out to this after this strip. There was no way. I'm glad I don't have OCD.  Now "Closing Time", there's some Cohen I can treadmill to.

name: terrainasaur
text: that's part of what's so damn funny about this one: to myself, this seems like and Impossible song to work out to.

name: boredom_man
text: A poor song for fucking to, though.

name: spicyponyhead
text: Leonard Cohen is like anti-fucking.

name: usversusthem
text: I think the film adaptation of Watchmen proved this conclusively.

name: phthoggos
text:
"First We Take Manhattan."

Put that on a treadmill and it's like a jazzier version of the ROCKY IV Ivan Drago training montage.

name: ghostd
text: That song is my kryptonite. The only, only song that makes me tear up. I ain't ashamed to admit it. You try listening to it.

name: milkpants
text: i'm listening to the song for the first time and i've teared up. *sniffle*

name: agika
text: Wow, I work out to the very same songs!  How weird!

name: zem
text: I just love that Beef A) records the song on the tape that many times and B) writes it down over and over

name: thegreatestcape
text:
Leonard Cohen - Suzanne

[x14]

name: terribleman
text:
He spent all afternoon, too. All having to rewind to exactly the same spot every time on his tape deck that doesn't heven have double speed.
I remember doing this with Leper Messiah back in the day. I loved that song to shreds. Still do, actually.

name: terribleman
text: To shreds, I say!

name: william
text: Alt Text: It's a thing with him that he still uses a Walkman with orange foam headphones.

name: chrissketch
text: He's wearing them as he working out. Nothing in the Walkman at all.

name: zefiel
text: Wow, no one noticed how Molly is so lovely she's hella wearing The One Ring

name: overmedicated
text: Beef's preeeecio *bricked*

name: spinynorman
text:
Oh, man, a thumb ring?

...eh, I guess that's in keeping with her character.

name: patkun
text: Hey, she is!And that Elvish looks accurate!

name: crinklebat
text: I really disagree with this assessment. I mean, I think it's supposed to look like the One Ring, but that Elvish looks pretty much like stone cold Arabic to this obnoxious nerd.

name: terebikun
text: I was going to reply all angry because I can read and write Arabic, but then I went back and looked at the comic, and it does actually look like Arabic.  Well played, sir.

name: achilleselbow
text: Shouldn't you be working for the CIA or something?

name: tekende
text: Who says he's not?

name: terebikun
text: Uncle Sam's got eyes everywhere .

name: nathanielperson
text: I'd have gone with Famous Blue Raincoat, myself.

name: killerlimpet
text: Who By Fire.

name: tourach3
text:
i've always been a fan of 'avalanche'
i think it would be a great song over and over again on a moderately-paced treadmill or elliptical machine that varied heights/resistances as sort of an epic adventure
i'd test out this theory myself if the damned cd player in the basement worked

name: kledermans
text: I like the little claws on her fingertips that you only see close-up.  This goes for all the cats' claws.

name: katsura
text: I just accidentally stumbled upon the fact that that song makes reference to the river I live on. Freaky.

name: terribleman
text: Other rivers are called "the river", you know...

name: dickie_roxx
text: I strongly suspicion that Beef works out to this song because of the reference to perfect bodies in the chorus.

name: autrepoupee
text: creep is top traxXx for working out on the pro-anorexia message boards for that very reason, maybe ill suggest suzanne next time i'm eating cocktail onions and crying

name: autrepoupee
text: i just realized upon rereading this comes off as kinda vicious being an anorexia joke and all. . . please dont start a tea-and-oranges diet craze based on my terrible, Mean suggestion

name: mystkmanat
text:
I woke up to Creep on the radio this morning!

...

I just thought you should know that.

name: nyu
text:
Whats a mix tape?

(kidding, really)

name: scott_335
text: I learned about mix tapes in history class.

name: pinballchacha
text: A comment left by pinballchacha was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Lord_Rama, mystkmanat, Zem, Appers)

name: zem
text: tell me what you think trolling means

name: charchar
text:
I love cassette tapes. We need more in our society.

[end transmission]

name: red-barchetta
text: A comment left by red-barchetta was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by goatmasterflash, mashisoyo, thehelmet, trisha, hawaiian_robot, Appers)

name: eidolem
text: I would pay up to nineteen dollars for orange foam headphones.

name: mystkmanat
text: Someone's been pricing out their novelty headphones!

name: flick
text:
Tape all maxed out, 24 seconds away from having an additional track on each side.

I, too, love cassette tapes.

name: genequagmire
text: That is an excellent song.

name: isaac_holladay
text:
Damn that's a sad song.
*big Cohen fan
